channel.title: people on Georgios Karamanis
channel.description: Recent content in people on Georgios Karamanis

item.title: Week 15
item.description: An impromptu photo shoot last Monday with Marius at Må bra massage. I’ve been a happy customer of his for many years and can’t recommend him highly enough.

item.title: Week 1
item.description: Another weekly photo journal, this year it is in black and white.

item.title: Conference at night with mobiles
item.description: [caption id=“” align=“alignnone” width=“1000.0”]The original is Edward Hopper’s Conference at night ( link ) [/caption]

item.title: Week 20
item.description: This week, even more buildings! Vertical edges Dead things Living and colourful things Tiles

item.title: Week 19
item.description: This week had a lot of facades It had more buildings but in perspective It had a few people And, finally, some plants

item.title: Week 15
item.description: The spring is here Oh, the sun and the buildings! Light and shadow play indoors Music!

item.title: Week 12
item.description: Sunny days Exercises in minimalism and geometry Light and shadow play

item.title: Week 11
item.description: A trip to Stockholm Buildings Daily weirdness Cold shadows

item.title: Week 10
item.description: Snow looks nice in black and white Snow looks nice in color

item.title: Exercise 1
item.description: Take fifteen random images from your archive and organize them into five different sequences. Explain your response to each. – Michael Northrup, Skipreading, The Photographer’s Playbook, p. 250 Houses Blurred The leftovers People Things behind glass

item.title: Week 4
item.description: Shooting from the warmth of home Being out and about Shooting walls and facades

item.title: Left turn
item.description: [Marrakech, Morocco #motionstills #motorcycle #shadowplay](https://www.instagram.com/p/BPIlv_VgS-h/) A video posted by Georgios Karamanis (@gkaramanis) on Jan 11, 2017 at 10:30am PST

item.title: Red wall
item.description: [A video posted by Georgios Karamanis (@gkaramanis)](https://www.instagram.com/p/BPA4ps9ALeI/) on Jan 8, 2017 at 10:42am PST

item.title: A cloud is hanging over my head

item.title: Rainy days are over
item.description: Just a few days ago I got my new camera, a Ricoh GRD IV. Here the first “test” shots. ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120606-R0010049.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120607-R0010074.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120609-R0010130.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120609-R0010145.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120609-R0010166.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120609-R0010176.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126rainy-days-are-over/20120609-R0010183.jpg)

item.title: What's on your head
item.description: A week ago I attended a street photography workshop with Eric Kim at Fotografiska in Stockholm. Lots of inspiration and nice people. I didn’t make the best images but I went way out of my comfort zone which is always good! Here are the photos of the project I had. ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126whats-on-your-head/20120601-GKAR6361.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126whats-on-your-head/20120601-GKAR6354.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126whats-on-your-head/20120601-GKAR6355.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126whats-on-your-head/20120601-GKAR6360.jpg) ![](/images/2012-06-09-20126whats-on-your-head/20120602-GKAR6475.jpg)

item.title: Valborg
item.description: It wasn’t only the cows that were celebrating on Valborg in Uppsala. ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5793.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5801.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5804.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5831.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5834.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5843.jpg) ![](/images/2012-05-07-20125valborg/20120430-GKAR5844.jpg)

item.title: Around the station

item.title: Holy cow!
item.description: Today it’s Valborg in Uppsala and even the cows are celebrating.

item.title: Moving
item.description: Jogging, walking and cycling in Växjö, Sweden ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5489.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5449.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5511.jpg)

item.title: Water Square
item.description: The Vattentorget (Water Square) by the lake in Växjö, Sweden. Sounds logical to me. ![](/images/2012-04-24-20124water-square/20120320-GKAR5399.jpg)

item.title: Under the bridge
item.description: Photos taken in Växjö, Sweden during the rainy day. ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5350.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5383.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5390.jpg)

item.title: A rainy day in Växjö
item.description: They say bad weather is good weather in terms of photography. A month ago I was in Växjö, a beautiful city in south Sweden. The first day there was a rainy one and I definitely think that the “best” photos were taken during that day. ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5312.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5301.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5317.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5319.jpg)

item.title: Demonstration
item.description: During the workshop and while we were outside Fotografiska, where Knut was talking about portraits, a demonstration took place right in front of our eyes. ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5025.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5026.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5040.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5034.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5041.JPG) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5053.JPG) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5044.JPG) ![](/images/2012-04-07-demonstration/20120317-GKAR5062.JPG)

item.title: Efthymios
item.description: My “homework” for the portrait workshop with Knut Koivisto. ![](/images/2012-04-03-efthymios/20120317-GKAR5222.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-03-efthymios/20120317-GKAR5196.jpg)

item.title: Johan
item.description: ![](/images/2012-04-02-johan/20120317-GKAR5112.JPG) On the first day of the portrait workshop, we had to take to take some photos of each other. Johan, a journalist and photographer (of course!), turned out to be a great model, too! ![](/images/2012-04-02-johan/20120317-GKAR5119.JPG)

item.title: Portrait workshop with Knut Koivisto, day II
item.description: Some photos I took with my iPhone during the second day of the portrait workshop with Knut.

item.title: Portrait workshop with Knut Koivisto, day I
item.description: Last weekend I attended a portrait workshop with Knut Koivisto at Fotografiska in Stockholm. Here are some photos from the first day (click on the image to see next) .
